title: Thaddeus Brown
description:
Thaddeus Brown is the mad scientist behind All Cars go to Heaven. He joined TST right after it was founded, bringing  the skills of a talented photographer and DP with him. He's a good driver, camera op, and Ferrari nerd. He visited LA from Dubai, so we rented a Ferrari 348 and drove it to the snow.

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Zack Klapman, Matt Farah)
